title: Why can you not see other player's honor levels on their profile?
body: I find it strange how when you view a player's profile it will show a slot for their honor level but the level itself will not be displayed. It can't be that hard to add in a toggle for it to be displayed or not, like how you can select which border you want or which clash banner is displayed.

replies.body:
There are reasons it isn't displayed publicly. I'm sure they *could* make it a player toggle, but even so there are ways to abuse that information.

Sure it means those who are H5 get to show it off, but what if you choose to hide your honour level? Are people going to assume that means you're toxic?

There are other ways to show off your Honour achievements (like the ward skins, limited skins and chromas) that can't really be abused in such a way. The Honour system itself is also designed much more as a "compete against yourself" type system rather than ranked which is a "compete against others".

I understand and agree with that, but then if they are not going to show honor then why have a slot for it when you look at other player's profiles? Its probably because you see it on your own profile, but its just another ultimately insignificant thing for me to be bothered about :/
I would imagine they want to keep profiles looking consistent so you can quickly and efficiently read and recognise what you came for. It does leave that awkward, essentially empty space though.
Well on that note, i feel like i have problems my boarder not sticking. It changes on it's own and I can't change it back =-/.

Do you mean your ranked borders? 

They will reflect what queue you are in, so in your case, normals loading screen will show Silver (since it's your highest rank), solo/duo will show your solo/duo rank (Silver), and TFT loading will show your TFT rank (Iron).

Recently I have earned a few new boarders and icons etc, so I have been changing them around. Sometimes they have reverted back or I could not see them in pre-game lobby/profile. Anyway no biggy, was just wondering.

If you mean skin borders they will only show up when you are using that particular skin, but you don't apply those they are automatic.

If you mean the prestige/ranked border accessed from the same panel as icon selection, it sounds like something isn't updating to the server properly and you should run a client repair, but again it doesn't really fit with what you're saying so I'm still not sure which borders you mean.

A screenshot would be very helpful.

Yeah ok. I'll remember that for next time I have any issues. It hasn't happened for a while now but most bugs I experience I send through to the bug report. Is it worth bringing them to boards to report as well or is bug report enough?

There is a "Report a Bug" thread on NA boards if you want to do more than submit a bug report, but there are pretty strict rules for posting so make sure you read them all carefully.

Submitting a bug report (however you choose to do it) will have no impact for local (specific to you) issues though. As with any online game, connection and PC configuration are a factor that can never be 100% accounted for. 

For such issues, you need to be troubleshooting your client/connection yourself, but generally, you shouldn't be concerned unless something is happening more than once or twice.
